pages.text: Crafting Summon Cards generally need $(#ff0000)original materials, card templates, and corresponding special essences$(). The crafting materials can be $(l)seeds, summoning cards$(), etc. the card template is corresponding to the $(l)quality$() of the Summon Card. The special essence is generally the essence corresponding to the creature.

Crafting Card templates need $(#ff0000)Origin Essences and specific materials$(). Special essences was introduced earlier.The original materials are complicated, because different Summon Cards require different materials. Fortunately, a creature only corresponds to one essence. According to the recipe, just look for the ingredients.

pages.title: PeaShooter Card
pages.text: Take $(#ff0000)PeaShooter Card$() as an example. PeaShooter is a creature with $(l)gray quality and appease essence$().So its recipe requires $(l)peas, gray card templates and $(#ff0000)Appease Essence$().
